publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3206 Trish Godman on behalf of the Local Government Committee: Local Government Committee, Inquiry into Local Government Finance—That the Parliament notes the 6th Report 2002 of the Local Government Committee, Inquiry into Local Government Finance (SP Paper 551) and calls upon the Scottish Executive to consider the report’s recommendations.

S1M-3206 Trish Godman on behalf of the Local Government Committee: Local Government Committee, Inquiry into Local Government Finance-That the Parliament notes the 6th Report 2002 of the Local Government Committee, Inquiry into Local Government Finance (SP Paper 551) and calls upon the Scottish Executive to consider the report's recommendations.
